title: Multiple Sparse Matrix Screens
author: Opentrons
description: Map Hampton Index HT deep block to lower wells of crystallization plate.  Distribute protein to upper wells of crystallization plate. Transfer liquid from each lower well to its upper well in crystallization plate.  Two blocks/plates total.
process:
Transfer 100 uL from Hampton Index HT deep block to lower wells of crystallization plate (1:1 plate mapping).
Distribute 1 uL of protein from cool deck to all lower wells of crystallization plate.
Transfer 1 uL of liquid in lower well to upper well of crystallization plate.
Repeat with second block and second plate.

markdown.title: Multiple Sparse Matrix Screens
markdown.author: [Opentrons](url)
markdown.description: Map Hampton Index HT deep block to lower wells of crystallization plate.  Distribute protein to upper wells of crystallization plate. Transfer liquid from each lower well to its upper well in crystallization plate.  Two blocks/plates total.
markdown.process:
1. Transfer 100 uL from Hampton Index HT deep block to lower wells of crystallization plate (1:1 plate mapping).
2. Distribute 1 uL of protein from cool deck to all lower wells of crystallization plate.
3. Transfer 1 uL of liquid in lower well to upper well of crystallization plate.
4. Repeat with second block and second plate.
